name: Dead Last PICO-8
description:
THIS IS A DEMAKE OF A GAME I HAVE ALREADY MADE. PLAY THE ORIGINAL HERE

Dead Last is a racing game with a twist; you have to come last. This can be achieved by not hitting the boost pads that come towards you, a task that gradually gets harder as the game goes on. Hit more than 3 boost pads and you "win the race" meaning it's GAME OVER
